short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select goals to win the tournament of football! Penalty Shooters 2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Penalty Shooters 2 you have the challenge of having the goalkeeper in the beats of Billiards Penalty King. Choose one of 360 teams from 12 páises (World Cup, Euro Cup, England, Germany, Spain …)! During the phase of groups, you need to classify the 1st or 2nd to go for the knockout stage.
